text: Mata Hari is a 1931 American biographical drama movie directed by George Fitzmaurice and starring Greta Garbo, Ramon Novarro, Lionel Barrymore, Lewis Stone, C. Henry Gordon, Karen Morley. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Fitzmaurice Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in the 20th century
title: Mata Hari (1931 movie)
